replies.msg:
每年嘅1042-s code有個 37 code (return of capital)，呢個歸入capital gain部分，所以外國人就唔taxable
Use code 37 (return of capital) for a nondividend distribution. This is a distribution that is not paid out of the earnings and profits of a corporation. It represents a distribution in part or full payment in exchange for stock.
至於每月/季邊啲taxable就睇返嗰間公司嘅 dividend structure 係點寫，一年年頭各公司會出埋份form 8937 話畀稅局聽佢個年啲息邊啲係因為profit派，邊啲係return of capital.
最後就係broker可能會幫你自動退返多收嘅，但多數無，要自己搵irs 搞退稅（最麻煩個步係申請itin,好似係）

replies.msg:
A trailing return looks at how an investment -- such as a mutual fund -- performed on a historical basis. The return consists of the change in share price over a recent period of time plus any dividends earned per share and converted to a percentage gain or loss. As an example, say a fund closed the most recent month with a share price of $11. A year earlier, the share price was $10, and over the year, the fund paid $0.50 in dividends per share. The total gain of $1.50 divided by the $10 starting share price produces a 15 percent trailing 12-month return.

追踪收益可以查看投資（例如共同基金）在歷史基礎上的表現。回報包括最近一段時間內的股價變化加上每股所賺取並轉換為損益百分比的任何股息。例如，假設一家基金以最近的一個月收盤價為11美元收盤。一年前，該股的價格為10美元，而在過去一年中，該基金支付了每股0.50美元的股息。 1.5美元的總收益除以10美元的起始股價所得的結果是，過去12個月的回報率為15％。
